General.Name: Escort Teknoloji Yatirim AS
General.Description: Escort Teknoloji Yatirim A.S. provides technology-based products, solutions, and services in Turkey and internationally. The company offers consumer electronic products, such as DSLR and compact cameras, lenses, mobile and tripod models, and carrying bags; and data and power communication infrastructure solutions comprising structured cabling products, rack cabinets, cable ducts, office sockets, and power distribution units that could be used in various applications, including data centers. It also engages in the purchase, assembly, sale, export, and import of computer programs, computer printers, and various electronic and electrical equipment; and machinery and devices and their spare parts, as well as generates solar based renewable energy. The company provides products and solutions in the field of information and energy infrastructure, banking, military, and industrial electronics. Escort Teknoloji Yatirim A.S. was founded in 1991 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Atakan Sokak No: 14 MecidiyekOey, Istanbul, Turkey, 334423
